00029 #include "actuators.h"
00030 #include "paparazzi.h"
00031 #include "generated/airframe.h"
00032 
00033 uint8_t servos_PPM_idx;
00034 uint8_t ppm_pulse;
00035 uint32_t servos_delay = SERVO_REFRESH_TICS;
00036 
00037 #define START_TIMEOUT 0xFFFF;
00038 
00039 void actuators_init ( void ) {
00040   /* select ppm output pin as MAT0.1 output */
00041   SERVO_CLOCK_PINSEL |= SERVO_CLOCK_PINSEL_VAL << SERVO_CLOCK_PINSEL_BIT;
00042 
00043   /* enable match 1 interrupt */
00044   T0MCR |= TMCR_MR1_I;
00045 
00046   /* lower clock         */
00047   T0EMR &= ~TEMR_EM1;
00048   /* set high on match 1 */
00049   T0EMR |= TEMR_EMC1_2;
00050 
00051   /* set first pulse in a while */
00052   T0MR1 = START_TIMEOUT;
00053   servos_PPM_idx = _PPM_NB_CHANNELS;
00054   /* Set all servos to their midpoints */
00055   /* compulsory for unused servos  */
00056   uint8_t i;
00057   for( i=0 ; i < _PPM_NB_CHANNELS ; i++ )
00058     servos_values[i] = SERVOS_TICS_OF_USEC(1500);
00059 }
00060 uint16_t servos_values[_PPM_NB_CHANNELS];
00061
